songs.title: Grave
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Verse]
I won't go
Yeah
I would not go
I would not go
You gotta know
Vital, oh baby, don't bite though
Remember what I left when I go
Remember what I said when I'm stoned
That's right

[Chorus]
Please don't stand at my grave and cry, no
I'm not there, they made it so I can never really die, no
Please don't stand at my grave and cry, no
Pop champagne, scream my words
Let me leave on a high note
And don't let nobody call me an idol
'Cause I was never sitting, I go
And Auckland, they go where I go
